poem:
**Beneath the Safety Net**

Figures dance on ledgers, cold and stark,  
a nation's lifeline spun into ghostly thread.  
Mathematics whispers, forecasts dark,  
while those who walk on its webbed bed  
feel echoes of futures yet to mark.  
Shadows loom, as promises shed,  
dissonance in the talk of the lark.
